originalText.text: My husband just underwent two Mohs surgeries performed Dr. Brauer and we couldn’t be more pleased. Dr. Brauer is progressional, thorough, easy to talk to and a skilled surgeon. His assistants and office staff are a pleasure to work with. I highly recommend Dr. Brauer.

text.text: My husband just underwent two Mohs surgeries performed Dr. Brauer and we couldn’t be more pleased. Dr. Brauer is progressional, thorough, easy to talk to and a skilled surgeon. His assistants and office staff are a pleasure to work with. I highly recommend Dr. Brauer.

originalText.text: Dr Brauer is the best dermatologist I’ve ever seen. He is instantly trustworthy and never made me feel like he was pushing me to do any treatment. He was thorough in explaining procedures and all my options as well. And the staff is all also incredibly kind.

text.text: Dr Brauer is the best dermatologist I’ve ever seen. He is instantly trustworthy and never made me feel like he was pushing me to do any treatment. He was thorough in explaining procedures and all my options as well. And the staff is all also incredibly kind.

originalText.text: I came across Dr. Brauer through my mom who went to him for a Mohs procedure (which came out beautifully) and I'm so happy I met him! I consulted with him regarding a scar on my forehead that I've been self-conscious about for almost two years. To me, it just never healed correctly following stitches that I received from an ER plastic surgeon. Well, within 1 minute of looking, Dr. Brauer identified that I still have stitches inside. I immediately scheduled an excision of the old stitches. Dr. Brauer was comforting, listened to my concerns, had a great sense of humor and made the procedure quick and painless. He even called me the following day to see how I was doing! I'm a few days post and I already see a positive change and feel great. I cannot thank Dr. Brauer enough, he is extremely talented, knowledgeable, friendly and will be a doctor that I go to for both cosmetic and medical needs!

originalText.text:
Dr Brauer is not only kind and compassionate, his professional care is tops in the industry. I felt confident that the care I received was the best choice for my skin condition and Dr Brauer was the best to administer the laser procedure.
I highly recommend Dr. Jeremy Brauer.

originalText.text: If you are looking for a dermatologist in the NYC area, GO TO DR. BRAUER!!!!! He is hands down the best doctor. He has the greatest energy about him, you never want to leave your appt!! Dr. Brauer makes sure that all your questions and concerns are fully answered before you start and after procedure. His knowledge and thoroughness throughout appointment allows you feel extremely confident in his recommended treatments. I give full trust to Dr. Brauer, he knows what he is doing, and he does it very very well!! If I were you, I would choose Dr. Brauer for any of your skincare needs!!!
